function.description: Return the translation of msgid for the current domain, or msgid unaltered if a translation does not exist.

function.name: bind_textdomain_codeset
function.description: Specify the character encoding in which the messages from the DOMAIN message catalog will be returned.

function.name: dcgettext
function.description: Return the translation of msgid for domain_name and category, or msgid unaltered if a translation does not exist.

function.name: textdomain
function.description: Set the textdomain to "domain". Returns the current domain.

function.name: bindtextdomain
function.description: Bind to the text domain domain_name, looking for translations in dir. Returns the current domain.

function.name: dgettext
function.description: Return the translation of msgid for domain_name, or msgid unaltered if a translation does not exist.

function.name: gettext
function.description: Return the translation of msgid for the current domain, or msgid unaltered if a translation does not exist.
